mapper.insert: insert into pay(ob_payno, o_odno, ob_type, ms_grade, cpa_no, pa_no, da_no, ob_price) values((select nvl(max(ob_payno),0)+1 from pay), #{o_odno}, #{ob_type}, #{ms_grade}, #{cpa_no}, #{pa_no}, #{da_no}, #{ob_price})
mapper.select: select * from pay order by ob_payno asc
mapper.update: update pay set o_odno = #{o_odno}, ob_type = #{ob_type}, ms_grade = #{ms_grade}, pa_no = #{pa_no} where ob_payno = #{ob_payno}
